patthana13.8:5.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:5.2: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:5.3: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:5.4: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.8:5.5: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo ca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana13.8:6.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana13.8:7.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.8:8.1: Dassanena pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.8:9.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.8:10.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate ekūnavīsa.
